body: query Employees { employees { details { forename hasChildren location { ...CountryFields } maritalStatus middlename nationality pastLocations { country { ...CountryFields } name type } pets { class gender name ...AlligatorFields ...CatFields ...DogFields ...MouseFields ...PonyFields } surname } } } fragment CountryFields on Country { key { name } } fragment AlligatorFields on Alligator { __typename class dangerous gender name } fragment CatFields on Cat { __typename class gender name type } fragment DogFields on Dog { __typename breed class gender name } fragment MouseFields on Mouse { __typename class gender name } fragment PonyFields on Pony { __typename class gender name }
